gobblin.runtime.locks

Class AbstractJobLockFactoryManager<T extends JobLock,F extends JobLockFactory<T>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.runtime.locks.AbstractJobLockFactoryManager<T,F>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JobLockFactoryManager<T,F>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FileBasedJobLockFactoryManager

    public abstract class AbstractJobLockFactoryManager<T extends JobLock,F extends JobLockFactory<T>>
extends Object
implements JobLockFactoryManager<T,F>
    A default base implementation for JobLockFactoryManager implementations. It maintains a cache from a factory configuration to factory instance.

      • getFactoryConfig

        protected abstract Config getFactoryConfig(Config sysConfig)
        Extracts the factory-specific configuration from the system configuration. The extracted object should uniquely identify the factory instance.

        protected abstract F createFactoryInstance(Optional<org.slf4j.Logger> log,
                                           Config sysConfig,
                                           Config factoryConfig)
        Creates a new factory instance using the specified factory and system configs.

      • getJobLockFactory

        public F getJobLockFactory(Config sysConfig,
                           Optional<org.slf4j.Logger> log)
        Provides an instance of a job lock factory with the specified config. If an instance with the same configuration (implementation-specific) already exists, the old instance may be returned to avoid race condition. This behavior is implementation-specific.
        Specified by:
        getJobLockFactory in interface JobLockFactoryManager<T extends JobLock,F extends JobLockFactory<T>>
